channel.title: Project DarkSouls317
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2itq1vt.jpg[/img]
I've currently got a website and a vps. I've been programming delta for years now and have decided that it is time to completely re-introduce delta. I need a team of coders and developers to spend time working on this server with me.
I also need someone who can make a custom webclient and someone who has the ability to add custom models.
The idea of the project is to make a delta server, full of custom mini-games, items and various others. It may seem shit to some of you, but i want originality. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2v8qo85.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/5a3gi.jpg[/img]
just a few bits of content, A lot still to be done Please pm me or reply to this for info thanks.

Good luck with development.
